QueueElement_t _SYS_MutexOwner_t::qelem

link used for queuing

Definition at line 54 of file sysMutex.h.

void* _SYS_MutexOwner_t::context

Purpose of this parameter is to save owner's execution context. It's up to the owner how to use this parameter. Mutex implementation must not modify this parameter.

Definition at line 59 of file sysMutex.h.

void(* _SYS_MutexOwner_t::SYS_MutexLockConf)(SYS_Mutex_t *const mutex, void *context)

This function is called in the case when the SYS_MutexLock() operation was postponed and now the mutex is locked by the owner.
